name: 口+口
description:
[Caution]Keyboard operation may not work at the first startup. Try reloading.

~

"口+口" is Musical 2D Platformer.

~

How to "口+口":

Move to arrow key (or wasd)
Jump to space key (or z)
? to down key(or s)

~
